title: Marinated ribs with tomatillo salsa, guacamole and tortilla chips
description: This Mexican feast is full of flavour and perfect for sharing. The flanken cut ribs will need to be cut by a butcher, but seek them out as they taste so delicious.
ingredients: 4 beef ribs, flanken cut to 1cm/½in thickness
1 bunch of coriander, stalks and leaves finely chopped
2 corn on the cobs, husks removed
½ red onion, very finely chopped
